name: Testimonials King Light
author: SVC

sections.description:
Testimonials Live Demo.Testimonial King Light is an easy-to-use best testimonial slider plugin that allows users to embed testimonials into a Page or Post using the shortcode with visual composer and gravatar support. Testimonial King also allows you to insert a list of all Testimonials or output a Random Testimonials. Testimonials King allows you to include an image with each testimonial – this is a great feature for adding a photo of the testimonials author or its gravatar.Testimonial King Light also provide a testimonial form to submit testimonials.

Testimonials King is a great plugin for:

  • COLOUR CHANGING EFFECT On Testimonials to Your Site.
  • Fully Customization no coding required.Displaying a Testimonial with a Rating.
  • Testimonial groups Allow You To Easily Organize Testimonials!
  • -to-use interface allows you to manage, edit, create, and delete Testimonials with no new knowledge!

Features include:

  • Full Customization As Per Visualization.
  • Gravatar support.
  • visual composer support.
  • Advanced Transitions: including colour Animations.
  • Advanced Options: Change every assests as per need.
  • Provided with form to get testimonials from users.

Pro Features include:

  • multiple templates.
  • multiple styles with every template.

  • customiztion options for each template.

    Testimonial King Light is the easiest way to start adding your customer testimonials with short code [GMCTK] and Form [GMCTK_FORM], right now! Click the Download button now to get started.

Premium Support

Testimonials King author does not provide direct support for Testimonial King on the WordPress.org forums. One on one email support is available to people who have purchased Testimonial King Pro only.Testimonial King Pro also includes tons of extra themes and advanced features, so you should upgrade today!
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the contents of /testimonial-king/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate Testimonial King through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit here for information on how to configure and use the plugin.
sections.faq: Visit here for answers to common questions with Testimonials King.
